executable.title: Resample Tubes (TubeTK)
executable.description: Resample the points comprising a tube tree.
executable.contributor: Matthew M. McCormick and Stephen Aylward (Kitware)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

parameters.label: Resampling Options
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the resmpling is performed.

image.name: matchImage
image.label: Match to Image
image.description: Output tube will be as-if extracted directly from this image.

integer.name: samplingFactor
integer.label: Sampling Factor
integer.description: Output tube will have Factor-times (e.g., 2x) more points

transform.name: loadTransform
transform.label: Transform
transform.description: Load the transform to be applied.

string.name: loadDisplacementField
string.label: Displacement Field
string.description: Specify the displacement field (e.g., generated using ANTS).

boolean.name: useInverseTransform
boolean.label: Use the Inverse of the Loaded Transform
boolean.description: Instead of using the transform directly, compute its inverse and apply. For a displacement field, the user is responsible for inputting the inverse displacement field.
